Infectum.turoyo: hano u=sobo ko-mšayəl u=ṭaboxo ʕal u=dayroyo naʕimo w-ko-mṣaʕal-le 246; 42/4, 5; b-u=ḥal-ano hənnək ku-mṣaʕri l-ḥḏoḏe, u=ṭaboxo ko-mbalaġ-ġe šlomefayəš ko-mṣaʕro l-ruḥa w-l-i=saʕa d-ḥzela eba u=kačalōk
translations: this old [monk] asked the cook about the young monk and abused him
‘Thus, they would abuse each other [and] the cook would send them regards’; 42/8;
‘She began to scold herself and the hour when she had seen the bald-headed’; 44/115

Infectum-wa.turoyo: i=naqqa d-marfan-wo aq=qarqure qum d-a=ʕwone, u=qarqur-ano mṣaʕar-wo 59/88; ənkān layto. lə=ko-mṣaʕro-wa l-babi 64/52; gəd-oṯe l-gabi me-darbe d-ono əzzí l-gabe, w-bəṯṯər m-aqqa ṣ=ṣurʕ-anək d-mṣaʕár-wayno-le
translations: wenn sie die Lämmer zu den Mutterschafen liessen, schimpfte dieses Lamm immer
es ist unmöglich. Sie würde meinen Vater nicht beschimpfen
‘He will come to me instead of me coming to him after those insults with which I used to abuse him’; 42/14
